title: Course Catalog & Digitalization Interest Survey
subtitle: For Teachers & Program Leaders | Ugly Duck School – Kunming, China

intro.purpose: The Spark-OS Team is partnering with your center to map existing courses, understand their design and effectiveness, and explore interest in future digital delivery. Your insights will help us:
intro.bullet1: Document each course's goals, structure, and target learners
intro.bullet2: Evaluate strengths, engagement levels, and improvement areas
intro.bullet3: Gauge interest and readiness for converting courses to online or blended formats
intro.bullet4: Inform resource and training plans for both course expansion and digital transition
intro.confidential: All responses are confidential and will be used to guide both course development and strategic digitalization planning.

consent.text: I understand that this survey will help document and improve course offerings, and I agree to share my professional insights.

methodologies.label: Teaching Methodologies: Which approaches are used across your courses? (Select all that apply)

curriculumNote.title: Full Curriculum Submission (PDF)
curriculumNote.instruction: Please compile all regularly offered courses into a single PDF, using the template for each course and labeling entries by Course ID. If you don't already use IDs, assign them as follows:
curriculumNote.format: Course ID Format: Use a two- or three-letter prefix for your center (e.g., UD for Ugly Duck) followed by a three-digit sequence number (001, 002, 003…). Example: UD-001, UD-002, UD-003
curriculumNote.includes: In your PDF, include for each course: Course ID & Name, Target Cohort, Format, Frequency & Duration, Class Size & Staffing, Prerequisites, Teaching Methodologies, Learning Objectives, Session-by-Session Syllabus, Materials & Resources, Assessment Methods, Differentiation & Accessibility, Digitalization Considerations
curriculumNote.upload: Upload: Attach this PDF when you submit the form.
